description.p: Use Instant Update Quick Build to deploy a build without having to go through the Cordova Genie.

discussion.p: If your Cordova project has turned on the Instant Update feature, the *[ui:Instant Update Quick Build]* button on the Web Projects Control Panel toolbar that allows you to quickly build an Instant Update without having to bring up the Cordova Genie. All modal dialogs normally displayed when an Instant Update is built are suppressed.

page.limitations: Cordova Apps with Instant Update Only
